summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my breton preset - Vasaaq.

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Vilemyr Inn of Ivarstead (console command "coc ivarsteadexterior01" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- loves to tank with a shield like there is no tomorrow, but can use other weapons aswell
- won't use shouts, magic and staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just fine clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some basic perks for 1H Sword + Shield, if it's too OP,  please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots:[/b] (pics from left to right)

Archmage Armor Parts from The Well Dressed Mage (Earrindo) + Armor Parts from SAM Dragonbone Set (VectorPlexus) + Armor Part from Light Elven Armor (RefurbMadness)
Spriggan Armor (LoversLab)
Beach Clothes by RefurbMadness
Casual Clothes from Apachii Divine Elegance Store (apachii and urshi)



I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]
